metadata.title: CVE-2010-0438
metadata.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Kernel/System/Ticket.pm in OTRS-Core in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 2.1.x before 2.1.9, 2.2.x before 2.2.9, 2.3.x before 2.3.5, and 2.4.x before 2.4.7 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
